description: Numbers n such that (22^n+1)/23 is a prime.
comments: Some of the larger terms may only correspond to probable primes.a(12) > 10^5 - _Robert Price_, Jun 02 2013
links: H. Dubner and T. Granlund, Primes of the Form (b^n+1)/(b+1), J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #P00.2.7.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 15 2000
